mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Making healthcare accessible, simple, and efficient
mission.description: Dawini is a digital healthcare platform in Algeria that connects patients, doctors, and pharmacists. Patients can book appointments easily, doctors can manage consultations and prescriptions, and pharmacists can validate prescriptions securely. The goal is to make healthcare more accessible, simple, and efficient.
mission.visionText: To revolutionize healthcare in Algeria by creating a seamless digital ecosystem that empowers patients, supports healthcare professionals, and improves overall health outcomes.

faq.question1: How do I book an appointment?
faq.answer1: Simply search for a doctor by specialty and location, then select an available time slot to book your appointment.
faq.answer2: Yes, we use bank-level encryption to protect all your medical information and ensure complete privacy.
faq.question3: Can I access my prescriptions online?
faq.answer3: Absolutely! All your prescriptions are stored securely in your patient dashboard and can be accessed anytime.
